data.subject: Please Believe Me
data.lyric:
Someone lights up my heart like the sun
 And that someone is you, please believe me
 You're my starl

data.subject: Hoop De Doo (With The Fontane Sisters)
data.lyric:
Hoop dee doo, hoop dee doo
 I hear a polka and my troubles are through
 Hoop dee doo, hoop dee dee
